title: Fee Structure | Namal University
text: Admissions Apply Admission Criteria Entry Test Information Upcoming Acceptable Entry Tests Scholarships Fee Structure FAQs Home Admissions Fee Structure PARTICULARS CATEGORY AMOUNT (PKR) Application Processing Fee Non-Refundable 1,000/- Admission Fee Non-Refundable 15,000/- Admission Security Fee Refundable 10,000/- Tuition Fee Per Year 500,000/- Scholarships Available Examination Fee Per Year 4,000/- Laboratory + Library Fee Per Year 6,000/- Hostel Fee Per Year (Sharing Basis) 24,000/- (For Boys) 12,000/- (For Girls) Hostel Security Fee Refundable 5,000/- General Fee Policies Namal University believes that education is the right of everyone regardless of their financial background. Therefore, generous merit and need based financial support is available. Those who can’t afford the above-mentioned fee; can apply for Financial support. Admission Fee (Non-refundable) Admission Fee and Security Fee are the one-time fees. Admission Fee and Security Fee will be paid at the time of admission. Tuition Fee is received on quarterly basis. × search
